# Case multi-chunk: Step 1

## Changed Files
- file.js

## Asset Files
- Bundle: a.js
- Bundle: b.js
- Bundle: main.js
- Manifest: a.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json, size: 25
- Manifest: b.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json, size: 25
- Manifest: main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json, size: 28
- Update: a.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js, size: 213
- Update: b.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js, size: 213
- Update: main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js, size: 216

## Manifest

### a.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json

```json
{"c":["a"],"r":[],"m":[]}
```



### b.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json

```json
{"c":["b"],"r":[],"m":[]}
```



### main.LAST_HASH.hot-update.json

```json
{"c":["main"],"r":[],"m":[]}
```


## Update


### a.LAST_HASH.hot-update.js

#### Changed Modules
- ./file.js

#### Changed Runtime Modules
- webpack/runtime/get_full_hash

#### Changed Content
```js
self["rspackHotUpdate"]("a", {
"./file.js"(module) {
module.exports = 2;


},

},function(__webpack_require__) {
// webpack/runtime/get_full_hash
(() => {
__webpack_require__.h = () => ("CURRENT_HASH")
})();

}
);
```

self["rspackHotUpdate"]("b", {
"./file.js"(module) {
module.exports = 2;


},

},function(__webpack_require__) {
// webpack/runtime/get_full_hash

- ./file.js

#### Changed Runtime Modules
- webpack/runtime/get_full_hash

#### Changed Content

self["rspackHotUpdate"]("main", {
"./file.js"(module) {
module.exports = 2;


},

},function(__webpack_require__) {
// webpack/runtime/get_full_hash
(() => {
